AlphaReleaseRuleRemoved(uint256,address,.details: emitted on remove Alpha release rule

params.rule: the release rule of Alpha receiver

AlphaReleaseRuleUpdated(uint256,address,.details: emitted on update Alpha release rule

params.rule: the release rule of Alpha receiver

getAlphaReleaseRules(uint256,uint256).details: returns the list of receiver and the list of amount that Alpha token will release to each receiver from _fromBlock to _toBlock

params._fromBlock: the start block to release the Alpha token
params._toBlock: the end block to release the Alpha token

returns._0: the list of Alpha token receiver and the list of amount that will release to each receiver

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAlphaReleaseRule(address,address).details: set the Alpha release rule to the Alpha token reward receiver

params._receiver: the receiver to set the Alpha release rule
params._rule: the Alpha release rule of the receiver set Alpha release rule to the receiver and add the receivver to the linked list of receiver

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

receiverRuleList.details: the list of receivers with rule

userdoc.notice: Implements the selector of Alpha rule.
